summary: SummaryLancôme Hydra Zen Gel Cream is a lightweight, hydrating, and soothing moisturizer that leaves skin feeling refreshed and less irritated, while helping to strengthen the skin’s moisture barrier. Best for oily and combination skin types, including sensitive.
details: DetailsBenefitsHydrating and Soothing: The gel cream provides intense hydration and soothes the skin, leaving it feeling refreshed and deeply moisturized. Skin is hydrated for up to 72 hours*. Skin hydration is increased by 52% half an hour after application**.Soothing Formula: The product effectively soothes skin, making it suitable for sensitive skin types. Visible inflammation was reduced by -22% after 4 weeks of use***Lightweight and Non-Greasy Texture: This moisturizer has a lightweight texture that absorbs quickly without leaving a greasy residue, making it ideal for oily skin types.Stronger Skin Moisture Barrier: The product helps protect the skin from environmental stressors such as pollution, wind, and cold, keeping it healthy and radiant, while helping to strengthen the skin’s moisture barrier.Improves Overall Skin Quality: Helps to improve the overall quality of the skin, making it appear smoother, more even toned, and youthful.SKIN CONCERNS: Dullness, redness, smoothnessSAFETY MEASURES: Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive. Dermatologist tested. Tested on sensitive skin.TEXTURE: Gel texture for a lightweight, refreshing feelFeaturesSkin hydration lasted for up to 72 hours*Skin hydration increased by 52% half an hour after application**Visible redness was reduced by -22% after 4 weeks***Research ResultsImmediately: 91% agree skin felt hydrated and moisturized; • 91% agree skin felt softerAfter 1 week: 91% agree skin felt soothed; 88% agree product gives a healthy glowClinical test with 28 women after 72 hoursItem 2630779How To UseApply a dime-sized amount of the hydrating moisturizer onto the face & neck and massage into the skin until absorbed.Follow with your eye care and/or makeup routine.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Alcohol Denat, Ammonium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate, Ci 14700/Red 4, Pca, Alanine, Madecassoside, Sodium Pca, Sodium Lactate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Paeonia Suffruticosa Root Extract, Phenylalanine, Arginine, Eugenol, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Chlorphenesin, Salicylic Acid, Valine, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-8, Dimethiconol, Limonene, Xanthan Gum, Benzyl Alcohol, Isopropyl Myristate, Propylene Glycol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Proline, Isoleucine, Aspartic Acid, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Sorbitol, Moringa Oleifera Seed Extract, Serine, Threonine, Rosa Gallica Flower Extract, Disodium Phosphate, Histidine, Octyldodecanol, Butylene Glycol, Citric Acid, Dextran, Glycine, Parfum/Fragrance.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply a dime-sized amount of the hydrating moisturizer onto the face & neck and massage into the skin until absorbed.Follow with your eye care and/or makeup routine.

reviews.headline: MUA artist here
reviews.comments: This gel cream has been my go-to for 7+ years and ive used it on every skin type before my makeup applications & it is SOO hydrating while light weight. A little goes a long way and out of the 100+ clients including myself, it has worked wonders. After the first application of this you'll notice a difference right away, it doesn't leave any type of residue after drying it melts into your skin and isnt oily. I have a oily T zone & this does not add to it. It made my skin feel so soft and hydrated throughout the entire day as well as night. Highly recommend 1000x over.

reviews.headline: Heavily scented
reviews.comments: Love the consistency of this but, like with most lancome products, its heavily scented and it does not entirely dissipate. The consistency is lovely. I only use a little bit, and it absorbs pretty quickly. My skin looks hydrated and glowy.  Its perfect under sunscreen, helps even application and prevent dryness and cakiness. I find this to be very similar to Clinique's moisture surge 100h hydrator. Clinique's is less expensive and unscented. I continue to buy both, since they offer the ideal level of hydration I need without feeling sticky or getting cakey.

reviews.headline: Lightweight and Leaves My Skin Feeling Silky
reviews.comments: I tried this on a cruise and was hooked.  Lancome Hydra Zen Gel Cream has a light rose scent and absorbs quickly.  I like the gel cream over the regular lotion as I find the regular lotion sticky on my face and I hate that.  This one is not sticky.  It is not cheap but a little goes a  long way.  I use it at night after my shower.

reviews.headline: Love this product.  I will buy it again.
Alcohol makes this drying
reviews.comments: Really disappointing. The smell and consistency is great, but ultimately this moisturizer is a huge let down and dries out my skin. Terrible under makeup. I would not recommend if you have dry skin. If used with a facial oil its fine, but at this price point it should stand on its own without intervention by a second product.

reviews.headline: I keep buying this lightweight moisturizer
reviews.comments:
This lightweight cream feels like light feather on your skin while doing its job of moisturizing very well.
It is the best moisturizer I ever used!

reviews.headline: Great Nighttime Moisturizer
reviews.comments: I tried this on a cruise and was hooked.  Lancome Hydra Zen Gel Cream makes my face very soft when used as a nighttime moisturizer.  Note: I did not like the regular Hydra Zen Cream as I found it sticky.  The gel absorbs right away,  It is pricey, so I only buy it when there is a deal.

reviews.headline: Glowing skin
reviews.comments: I've bern using Lamer for years but after wearing the cream for a couple lf hours it make my skin super oily. I have oily skin and this gel cream dry fast while leaving a natural glow. I love it.

reviews.headline: A must
reviews.comments: I bought this since I have oily to normal skin. Love how it feels on my skin.

reviews.headline: Best moisturizer for your face
reviews.comments: protecting stressed skin from sun damage and pollution. I find this moisturizing gel cream the best. I have oily skin but when i apply it begore putting make up on it does not make my make up oil. Great product

reviews.headline: Smells like Old Lady
reviews.comments: I wanted to love this and don't get me wrong I DO for the most part. It's super hydrating and makes my skin feel AMAZING, but I'm not seeing the 72 hours of hydration that was claimed, I'd say 48 hours at the most. All that said I don't think I'll be repurchasing after I finish this jar because of the OLD LADY SMELL!!!! I just can't deal lol. Anyways if you don't mind smelling like Old Lady this is a solid moisturizer for daytime use.

faceoff_positive.comments: This gel cream has been my go-to for 7+ years and ive used it on every skin type before my makeup applications & it is SOO hydrating while light weight. A little goes a long way and out of the 100+ clients including myself, it has worked wonders. After the first application of this you'll notice a difference right away, it doesn't leave any type of residue after drying it melts into your skin and isnt oily. I have a oily T zone & this does not add to it. It made my skin feel so soft and hydrated throughout the entire day as well as night. Highly recommend 1000x over.
